tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bike_routes (
  route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  difficulty_level INT,
  distance DECIMAL,
  landmarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bicycle_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(100),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  landmarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trail_information (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_name VARCHAR(100),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  landmarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BicycleRoutes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  landmarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Trails (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_name VARCHAR(255),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  start_point VARCHAR(255),
  end_point VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Landmarks (
  landmark_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landmark_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE bicycle_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  difficulty_level TEXT,
  distance_km FLOAT,
  landmark_1 TEXT,
  landmark_2 TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trail_info (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_name TEXT,
  trail_type TEXT,
  difficulty_level TEXT,
  distance_km FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE route_landmarks (
  route_id INT,
  landmark_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (route_id, landmark_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES bicycle_routes(route_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (landmark_id) REFERENCES landmarks(landmark_id)
);
CREATE TABLE bicycle_routes (id INT, route_name VARCHAR(255), difficulty_level VARCHAR(50), distance_km FLOAT, landmarks VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE trail_difficulty (id INT, difficulty_name VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE popular_landmarks (id INT, landmark_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE trail_lengths (id INT, trail_id INT, length_km FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (trail_id) REFERENCES bicycle_routes(id));

CREATE TABLE trail_landmarks (id INT, trail_id INT, landmark_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (trail_id) REFERENCES bicycle_routes(id), FOREIGN KEY (landmark_id) REFERENCES popular_landmarks(id));
